title: Does Leaverbuster affect Honor Level Progression?
body: I got hit with a 5 min low priority for 5 games, will my honor be affected negatively?

replies.body: AFAIK the only things that will lower your Honor Rank are actual punishments, such as suspensions or bans.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GYkx5erM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-04T02:03:31.015+0000)
>
> AFAIK the only things that will lower your Honor Rank are actual punishments, such as suspensions or bans.

Thanks for the reply! I reached honor 3 this morning so I guess that didnt matter at all indeed.
